db:abstract.db:para: Adds categories to a chart's axes.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The BarCategoryAxis type can be set up to show an axis line with tick marks, grid lines, and shades. Categories are drawn between the ticks. It can be used also with a line series.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] count : int
db:section.db:para: The number of categories of an axis.

db:section.db:title: max : string
db:section.db:para: The maximum value on the axis.

db:section.db:title: min : string
db:section.db:para: The minimum value on the axis.

db:section.db:title: rangeChanged(string min, string max)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when min or max value of the axis changes.
The corresponding signal handler is onRangeChanged.

db:section.db:title: void clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all categories. Sets the maximum and minimum values of the axis range to QString::null.
